name: Denver Justice: Bomb Squad
description:
Welcome to Denver Justice: Bomb Squad, cadet. We just lost our last explosives disassembly professional due to an on-the-job accident, so we're in need of fresh meat. Thanks for showing up.

-

This is the first release from House Husband Interactive for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4. We really hope you enjoy our twisted, tension-filled take on a code breaking puzzle game! Use your phone to connect to the bomb and disarm it. New players are advised to hit the tutorial first -- you've only got 60 seconds to save the city!

Our submission also meets the criteria for one of the challenges: Extra Remix! Denver Justice began as an in-office joke between friends and a fake movie poster -- but now it's an interactive game. 

-

We used the last few minutes of the jam to add one of our nice-to-have features: A leaderboard! You can see all of the fantastic people who exploded at https://denverjustice.net/leaderboard

-

House Husband Interactive is:

Mike Brannon - https://mic-b.com
Music Composition, Programming, Design

Pieter Montoulieu - https://pixelglitch.net
Music Composition, Programming, Design

-

How many bombs can you defuse in a row? Can you even defuse one?
